title: So when are pro's going to pick up Malzahar?
body:
He can build tanky or glass cannnon and melts everything including tanks.

I'm just curious so I know when to expect the nerfs.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Torasuto,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=U5AvqM02,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-30T00:21:42.368+0000)
>
> When he becomes mobile

Viktor isn't mobile, and he's showing up quite often...

Well, he has the speed boost on his Q having a shield with it and he also has his field thing. It keeps him pretty safe while malz doesn't have anything to help him with speed in general. 

Tl;dr Viktor has tools to get out of trouble while malz doesn't

My guess at least
Well, depends on when Keane decides to use him.

just saying malz is a extremely good solo q champ but a terrible lcs champ, here is the reasoning his ult locks him in place while it does good damage he just sits there and a coordinated team(lcs) would immediately melt him down or just throw a stun at him and invalidate him while in solo q there is alot less communication and thus it is easier for him to just pick some hopeless guy and delete him because odds are he wont get immediately cc'd and rekt
DO NOT TOUCH MALZ AND MY FREELO >:(
